title: Exquisite Polki Kundan Ring - A Timeless Statement Piece
features: This ring showcases a beautiful floral design meticulously set with uncut Polki diamonds. The setting is a classic Kundan style, reflecting the traditional craftsmanship of Hyderabad. The use of 'closed setting' enhances the brilliance of each individual polki. The band of the ring is designed for comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white Polki diamonds. The Hyderabadi Polish lends a slightly antique golden hue
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
or any special event where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for a sophisticated evening out.
description: This Polki Kundan ring is a testament to timeless South Indian elegance.
